ComicInfo.Penciller: Doug Wildey,Jack Keller,Joe Maneely,Jack Keller,Doug Wildey
ComicInfo.Summary:
A young gunslinger vows to beat Kid Colt to make his reputation, but the Kid outdraws him with ease.
Kid Colt falls afoul of two bandits and a sheriff with a grudge.
An unarmed lawyer faces down a local gunslinger with only courage and his boxing skills.
Kid Colt humiliates a local bully.
Kid Colt convinces a youth enamored of the outlaw life to stick to the straight and narrow.
ComicInfo.Title: Kill Kid Colt on Sight!; Lawman; Trail of the Outlaw!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
